dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5661 IH: Northern Mariana Islands Entrepreneurship Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan (for himself and Mrs. Radewagen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the microloan program of the Small Business Act to define State, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Northern Mariana Islands Entrepreneurship Act of 2023.
Paragraph (11) of section 7(m) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(m)(11)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (ii) of subparagraph (C), by striking rural and all that follows through the end of the clause and inserting rural;;
in subparagraph (D), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: the term State means each of the several States, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands of the United States, Guam, the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, and American Samoa.
